v3-design.notes: Front-breathing design failed Roundtable AI engineering review - BLOCK RELEASE

v4-design.notes: Ducted rear plenum, 150mm depth - REDESIGN REQUIRED verdict

v5-engineering-validation.notes: PASS FOR PROTOTYPE VALIDATION - 13% thermal margin, watch items: recess install risk

v51-website-update.notes: All website HTML files updated to v5.1 specs

v52-recess-compatible.notes: v5.2.1 PASS FOR PROTOTYPE - ChatGPT engineering review passed. Fixes: diffuser plate, 60mm top gap, 45° deflector (architectural shadow element), 4 latches, Delta fan lock

v521-website-update.notes: All website HTML files updated to v5.2.1 specs (specification, designs, engineering-analysis, index)

v522-ip55-upgrade.notes: IP55 upgrade: double-layer labyrinth baffles, 75mm deflector, gasketed filter drawer, higher-durometer EPDM. BOM $638.63. Live site verified.

pool-enclosure-v1.notes: APE Series Pool Equipment Enclosures v1.0. Modular system (BASE + extensions), acoustic soundproofing (70-80% noise reduction), chiller variant. Passive ventilation (no fans). 5 files created.

pool-enclosure-market-analysis.notes: Global market analysis complete. GCC (500-650K pools), Southern Europe (France 3M, Spain 1.3M), USA (10.4M). Year 5 target $5.9M. IP55 rain-proof design. UAE directory (120+ companies). Heater/chiller physics added to designs.

ai-director-phase2.notes: Phase 2: Supabase database integration + Claude API integration. AI Queue and Partner CRM now save to real Supabase database. Backend server created for Claude API proxy. New Enquiry modal generates real AI responses via Claude.

production-deployment.notes: Full production deployment: GitHub repos, Vercel hosting, Vercel Serverless Functions for Claude API. Live at apex-tv-enclosures.vercel.app

ai-director-phase3.notes: Phase 3: Email automation infrastructure. Created /api/webhook/email, /api/send-reply, /api/enquiries endpoints. AI Queue now loads real enquiries from Supabase and approves via API. Ready for Mailgun webhook connection.

zapier-integration.notes: Zapier webhook integration: /api/zapier.js with sendToZapier() helper. Events: new_enquiry, new_order, order_status_changed, order_won, order_lost. Setup UI in setup.html with test button.

lead-capture.notes: Lead capture features: (1) chat-widget.js - floating chat bubble with 3 options. (2) Lead magnet - 'Outdoor TV Buying Guide' email capture. (3) Contact form modal submits to AI Director. Added to all 8 customer-facing pages (retail, industries, partner, commercial).

ai-director-dashboard.notes: Dedicated AI Director dashboard (ai-dashboard.html) with stats, navigation cards, activity feed. Consistent nav bar added to all AI Director pages: Dashboard → Queue → Orders → Insights → CRM.

dashboard-reorganization.notes: Split dashboards into Sales vs Product Development. Master dashboard (index.html) with two paths. Product dashboard (product-dashboard.html) with tabs for TV Enclosures and Pool Equipment. Clean separation of daily operations from product development.

navigation-split.notes: Split navigation: sales-nav.js for Sales pages (horizontal bar with Core/Partners/Tools groups), nav.js updated for Product pages only (sidebar). 14 Sales pages updated. Removed internal nav from customer-facing pages.

unified-navigation.notes: Unified nav.js with context-aware sidebars. Main dashboard standalone hub. All Sales pages purple (#6366f1). Fixed header positioning for sidebar. Created partnership term sheet for UK sales partner.

lastSession.summary: Jan 12 (Late): Context switch to Apex IQ. Verified Hire Outcomes v1 already built (90d/6m/12m/24m checkpoints, success scoring, departure tracking). Updated FEATURE-PLAN-Jan2026.md with 'Current State' section clarifying what exists vs. what Feature 4 (Placement Learning) will add: regret tracking, failure taxonomy, psychometric linkage, scoring adjustments. Prior session: Accurate Metal follow-up, ESP32-C3 Design Pack sent to Ted.

confidential.manufacturerIdentity: NEVER disclose manufacturer name externally. Use generic terms like 'ISO-certified facility' or 'our manufacturing partner'.

website/specification.html - Full manufacturing specification + 5 SVG drawings
website/bom-detailed.html - Bill of materials with Alibaba suppliers
website/wiring-diagram.html - SVG schematic with wire schedule

website/ai-queue.html - AI approval queue with Claude integration
website/partner-crm.html - Partner CRM with Supabase sync
serverless-api: website/api/enquiries.js - CRUD for enquiries with RAG learning
website/api/send-reply.js - Send approved replies + learn from edits
website/api/auto-followups.js - Auto-generate follow-ups based on rules
orders-pipeline: website/orders.html - 6-stage Kanban pipeline with auto follow-ups, lead temperature, win/loss tracking
zapier: website/api/zapier.js - Webhook helper and test endpoint
lead-capture: website/retail/chat-widget.js - Floating chat widget with lead magnet and contact form
ai-dashboard: website/ai-dashboard.html - Sales & Operations hub with stats and activity feed
product-dashboard: website/product-dashboard.html - Product Development hub with TV/Pool tabs
navigation: website/nav.js - Unified context-aware sidebar (Sales purple #6366f1, Product teal #0d9488)
partnership: partnership-term-sheet.md - 50/50 equity split with vesting milestones for UK sales partner
services: website/services-pricing.html - Internal services pricing with profit margins

keyDecisions.thermal: Ducted rear plenum, 3× Delta AFB1412HH-A fans, 210-250 CFM

v3.0.verdict: BLOCK RELEASE - thermal path missed TV heat sinks

v4.0.verdict: REDESIGN REQUIRED - insufficient margin, poor service access

v5.2.2.cfm: 180-210 CFM (reduced due to IP55 baffle restriction)
